Caption.String: In Value mode, SAM applies both inflation and escalation to the first year cost to calculate out-year costs. In Schedule mode, neither inflation nor escalation applies. See Help for details.

Description.String: Type a fixed battery O&M cost per unit of battery capacity for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
Type a fixed annual battery operating cost for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.
Type a battery replacement cost in $ per unit of battery capacity for each year.
Type a variable O&M cost per unit of battery discharged electricity for each year. SAM does not apply inflation or escalation to the values you specify.

om_capacity_escal.Label: Battery fixed cost by capacity escalation

om_production_escal.Label: Battery variable cost by generation escalation
